therefore, any score would be postponed indefinitely until further notice.', 'Suspend – To temporarily stop (an activity or event) without canceling it completely; the scoring may resume at a later date but remains on hold now.', 'Defer - To put off an action or decision to a later time, thus delaying the scoring indefinitely.', 'Dismiss – To decide that something is not important and should not be considered further; this could translate to disregarding any score until clarification comes through.', 'Invalidate – To make (something) legally or formally void or invalid, similar to nullify but with a legal connotation which may imply more permanence in some contexts.', 'Postpone - To delay an event to a later time or date;
